components.description:
A threaded silver needle. Color of thread varies from platform to platform.

Can be used to talk about crafts including embroidery, quilting, or sewing in general. Can also be used in medical contexts to talk about stitches.

Used metaphorically at the beginning of a thread, or series of connected posts by one person, on social media.
components.title: Sewing Needle

version.description:
Unicode 13.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on March 10, 2020. 55 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 117 new emojis for 2020 (including sequences for gender and skin tone) listed under Emoji 13.0.

apple_vendor_description: Appleâ€™s sewing needle emoji features a slender, sharp implement with a precisely defined eye, rendered with exquisite detail and a touch of metallic sheen. Realistic lighting and 3D shading on Apple devices highlight its fine point and the smooth curve of the thread passing through its eye, creating a sense of delicate craftsmanship. This emoji, representing sewing, mending, or creation, brings an artisan touch and a feeling of precision to messages on Apple devices.
